reviews.review_msg: 3 expensive text books, 2 of them can be considered communication bibles. lectures are a bit dry and irrelevant but overall, the prof is a humourous, nice guy.

he tries to be funny every time but the lecture material itself was quite confusing and you have to write down the notes every lecture cuz if you don't you won't really understand what the course is about.

He is really nice! Interesting lecture with a set of videos... However, if you dont grow up in the North American countries with watching the regular shows like Cops, Touched by a Angel, etc. you may find it is a little hard to understand the lecture content.
